column4: hi. I've got a xubuntu box behind my adsl modem. how can I give the xubuntu box a fixed ip? (typically 10.0.0.4)
Fixed as in static for the LAN?
static for the LAN sounds right
you need to edit the /etc/network/interfaces file to use a static ip, ie. not request one from the DHCP server on your router/modem. I'll see if I can find an easy how-to real quick...
